conventions.style: Formatted as '<A_count>v<B_count>' where A is the first side and B is the second side.

placeholders.Attack: Generic attack placeholder (legacy; may be unused)
placeholders.AttackA: Attack placeholder used by side A in alt-mode
placeholders.FalseAttackB: Non-lethal maneuver placeholder used by side B in alt-mode

rules: Every template explicitly eliminates all participants on the B side.
25% of templates per style include vehicle or combiner placeholders.
About half of alt-mode templates include both sides in alt-mode; others are A-side only.
When both sides are in alt-mode, templates use {AttackA} for A and {FalseAttackB} for B.
All involved participants have placeholders (A1..Ak and B1..Bm).
1/2/3 v ANY favor vehicles; 4/5 v ANY randomly mix vehicles/combiners.
Each template includes added dialogue for richer narration.
